Praise be to God. Today we launched the strategic plan to be Dubai the global capital of the Islamic economy .. http://t.co/zzFLI13f72
The plan has 7 axes and 46 huge initiatives that we will implement within 36 months, God willing
The economies of the Islamic countries are more than 8 trillion dollars and the population is 1.6 billion. Our goal is to raise the quality and outputs of the Islamic economy to new levels
The Islamic economy is not new to us in the UAE, but we have great experience in it .. The first Islamic bank in the world was from the UAE as well as the first Islamic stock exchange

Today we launched The strategic plan of Dubai becoming the global capital of the Islamic economy http://t.co/vOVOISEknf
The plan consist of 7 pillars and 46 major initiatives to be implemented within 36 months
The 1st stock exchange and the 1st Islamic bank were founded in the UAE
This speaks of Dubai's cumulative experience and eligibility to become the global capital of the Islamic economy
The total amount of 102 pens we will open for two days in Adana is 860 million liras. We are just doing a service harvest.
I come to Adana and talk about nationalism and nationalism: loving the country and the nation is not with insulting speeches.
'Turks' they said, the reputation of Turkey in the stalled.
'Doğruyum' they said, Turkey is condemned to corruption.
They said 'hardworking', they came to side for years. Turkey is condemned to faizet, inflation, unemployment.
We are not slogan nationalists. For us, nationalism is to serve the nation. Countries can not develop with skull nationalism.
Today is Teacher's Day, every year and all our teachers are fine and God willing, there will be a week in which every student will celebrate

I chaired today a meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace in Abu Dhabi ... during which we adopted the establishment of a permanent State Mission to the European Union http://t.co/iUB2eEzMzd
UAE diplomacy under the leadership of my brother Sheikh Khalifa is characterized by its balance and ability to produce ideas and solutions in international forums at all times
We seek to establish the state as a leading model in development and a key player in spreading the values ​​of peace, dialogue and tolerance through all our diplomatic efforts
During the meeting, we adopted a number of international conventions of an economic nature and adopted a number of final budgets for several governmental bodies

At the meeting of the Council of Ministers, we addressed today the holiday of Eid from Sunday, 8 Dhu al-Hijjah, and the working day continues on the following Sunday, with our wishes for a happy holiday for all

I am pleased to graduate a group of national experts in the management of government performance .. They are the forefront of payments in this area http://t.co/BxUpZplMTw

The science of government administration is a broad science and our goal is to develop specialists, experts and consultants in this field .. The country does not develop only with its capable and qualified children
We in the Executive are squarely on the side of the people. http://t.co/PcHKfA1rH0
Building our capacity and our cadres in the field of public administration is a basic practice for us. Maintaining our competitiveness requires the development of experts with global standards
These experts will be part of the daily work cycle in their institutions. Everyone who contributes even if something simple in our development is considered a leader and see him as one of my team
